data.title: Artefact, a 2D ‘platformer’ game
data.summary: Artefact is a take on the 2D platformer genre, in the same vein as Mario, Sonic and Lode runner.

data.title: car.pool
data.summary: The car.pool application is a proof-of-concept front-end application for a hypothetical customer, built as part of a challenge.

data.title: Skye, the IRC chatbot
data.summary: Skye is an IRC chatbot which I begun working on at university as part of my third year Natural Language Processing coursework. It started off as a simple automated tally for games played on the AppliedIRC network and has had features tacked onto it over the years.

data.title: Tasks
data.summary: A tiny little to do list application whose sole aim is to be clean and unobtrusive.
